description: Relates to productivity, quantity of work and accomplishments in a given time within the required schedules.
Accurate and systematic work according to company and superior standards. Free from work irregularities.
Report to work on time, observes regulations and procedures on leave of absence. Observes prescribed attendance and work schedules.
Respects and having harmonious relationship w/ co workers, superiors, customers and others.
Good grooming, appropriate clothing and complete set of uniform at all times. Protects the company's interest.
